channel.title: Chaotic weapon invisible? 317 tragedy pk anyone know why?

item.title: Chaotic weapon invisible? 317 tragedy pk anyone know why?
item.dc:creator: @Ye_Im_Ace Ye Im Ace
item.description:
@Ye_Im_Ace wrote:

  1. Probably the wrong ints
  2. Maybe it isn’t the right model for your client
  3. you didn’t do addmodel #### in-game (317 only).

item.title: Chaotic weapon invisible? 317 tragedy pk anyone know why?
item.dc:creator: @julianx13 julianx13
item.description:
@julianx13 wrote:

when i wear it it goes invisible anyone know why?

case 15039:
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.aByte205 = -10;
itemDef.aByte154 = -10;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 35089;//female
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 4;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 2;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1360;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 354;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 498;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 35089;
itemDef.modelID = 35088;
itemDef.name = “Chaotic maul”;
itemDef.anInt188 = -1;//female sleeve
itemDef.anInt164 = -1;//male sleeve
itemDef.description = “A dangerously-blunt maul. (It doesnt look in good condition.)”.getBytes();
break;
